title: Can Traore have Barcelona impact?
shortDescription: Assessing Adama Traore's time in England and whether he can succeed at Barcelona.

title: Van de Beek close to joining Everton on loan from Man Utd
shortDescription: Everton are close to signing Donny van de Beek on loan after agreeing a deal with Manchester United.

title: Liverpool sign Diaz from Porto on five-and-a-half-year deal
shortDescription: Liverpool have signed winger Luis Diaz from Porto for an initial fee of £37m.

title: Newcastle agree fee with Brighton for Burn
shortDescription: Newcastle have agreed a fee of £13m with Brighton for defender Dan Burn.

title: How to follow Deadline Day on Sky Sports
shortDescription: Deadline Day is looming - here's all you need to know and how to follow the drama with Sky Sports...

title: West Ham among clubs interested in Leeds' Raphinha
shortDescription: A number of clubs, including West Ham, are interested in Leeds winger Raphinha.

title: Spurs agree deals with Juventus to sign Kulusevski and Bentancur
shortDescription: Tottenham have agreed deals with Juventus to sign winger Dejan Kulusevski and midfielder Rodrigo Bentancur.

title: Papers: West Ham bid £50m for Phillips
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Sunday's national newspapers...

title: Fulham fan dies after cardiac arrest at Blackpool game
shortDescription: A Fulham supporter has died after suffering a cardiac arrest during Saturday's match against Blackpool at Craven Cottage.

title: Non-League forward Tanner fails to agree Spurs personal terms
shortDescription: Lewes forward Ollie Tanner's move to Spurs is off with the Isthmian Premier League club claiming the player was unable to agree personal terms.

title: Ross County's Charles-Cook 'extremely hurt' over racist abuse
shortDescription:
Ross County attacker Regan Charles-Cook has been left "extremely hurt" after
being subjected to racist abuse following his side's 3-3 draw with Rangers.

title: Papa John's Trophy: The state of play
shortDescription: As the 2021/22 Papa John's Trophy reaches its latter stages, we bring you the state of play, upcoming fixtures and the schedule for the remainder of the tournament.

title: Brighton expected to sign Undav and Enciso by Deadline Day
shortDescription: Brighton are expected to complete the signing of striker Deniz Undav from Belgian club Union Saint-Gilloise on transfer Deadline Day.

title: Sharp hits landmark goal in routine Sheff Utd win
shortDescription: Billy Sharp became the outright leading Championship goalscorer since the division was rebranded in 2004 as Sheffield United beat struggling Peterborough 2-0.

title: Hosts Cameroon ease into AFCON semi-finals
shortDescription: Karl Toko Ekambi scored twice as hosts Cameroon booked their place in the Africa Cup of Nations semi-finals with a 2-0 quarter-final win over Gambia.

title: EFL highlights, round-up: Fulham held; Sunderland ship six at Bolton
shortDescription: Championship leaders Fulham were held by Blackpool, Bolton thump six past Sunderland in League One and League Two leaders Forest Green thrash Tranmere.

title: Barcelona re-sign Traore from Wolves on loan
shortDescription: Adama Traore has returned to Barcelona on loan from Wolves until the end of the season, with the La Liga side having the option to make the deal permanent.

title: Livingston come from behind twice to win at Hibs
shortDescription:
Alan Forrest struck the winner as Livingston twice came from behind to pull off
an impressive 3-2 victory away to Hibernian.

title: Dykes scores twice as QPR thump Reading
shortDescription: QPR thrashed Reading 4-0 to boost their promotion hopes and pile more pressure on Royals boss Veljko Paunovic.

title: Bowler strikes to hold Fulham after lengthy delay
shortDescription: Josh Bowler's second-half strike denied Fulham a fifth-successive league win as Marco Silva's Championship leaders were held to a 1-1 draw by Blackpool at Craven Cottage.
